New Records: Paul Skenes finished his rookie campaign with an 11-3 record, a 1.96 ERA, a 0.95 WHIP and 170 strikeouts over 133 innings pitched
Key Match Events: Paul Skenes pitched two scoreless innings with a 99.6 mph fastball to retire Jazz Chisholm Jr.
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Derek Shelton emphasized the importance of ramping up Skenes' workload to ensure he could excel and set him up for 2025
Post-Match Reflections: Paul Skenes expressed gratitude for finishing the season strong and being able to do it against the Yankees' lineup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Paul Skenes' rookie campaign will go down as one of the best ever for a Pirates pitcher, if not for any rookie pitcher
Others: Paul Skenes' season went about as well as anyone had hoped, and he is focused on winning more games in the 2025 campaign
